lexUnit.name: heart.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the central, innermost, or vital part of something.

sentence.text: Fried artichoke hearts stood arranged around hard-boiled eggs which had been tinted pink and yellow and scarlet and blue in honour of Easter Day .
